column4: Hello, I have a question. Shipit shipped me like one year a go Ubuntu 4.10, now I want to install it (1 year later)... After I install it can I update it to the 5.10 ?
update sources.list to breezy, apt-get update, apt-get dist-upgrade
pretty much, ubuntuguide.org has an entry for upgrading from warty/hoary to breezy
